sentences.en: a hip-hop album with incendiary lyrics
sentences.cn: 充满煽动性歌词的嘻哈乐专辑

sentences.en: A shower of incendiaries struck the Opera House.
sentences.cn: 阵雨般的燃烧弹击中了歌剧院。

sentences.en: A weapon that projects ignited incendiary fuel, such as napalm, in a steady stream.
sentences.cn: '喷'.''火''.'器'. ''一种以固定流状形式喷射燃料(如凝固汽油)的武器.

sentences.en: But his image never entirely lost its incendiary appeal.
sentences.cn: 但他的音容笑貌留下了不可磨灭的印象.

sentences.en: Five incendiary devices were found in her house.
sentences.cn: 在她家里发现了5个纵火装置。

sentences.en: Incendiary mortar no longer cause engine damage over and over on some vehicles.
sentences.cn: 迫击炮纵火弹不再会对某些车辆反复造成引擎损害.
这是一次典型的纵火行为.

sentences.en: Post racist, incendiary, or otherwise objectionable content.
sentences.cn: 张贴种族主义者, 纵火者, 或不那样讨厌的内容.

sentences.en: Protocol on Prohibitions or Restrictions on the Use of Incendiary Weapons ( Protocol III )
sentences.cn: 禁止或限制使用燃烧武器议定书 ( 第三议定书 )

sentences.en: The incendiary article written by the leftist has in some degree instigated the racial rioting.
sentences.cn: 那篇由左翼份子执笔的煽动性文章,某程度上促使了种族暴乱发生.

sentences.en: The influence factors of testing dispersity of oil - based incendiary agent are also discussed in the paper.
sentences.cn: 讨论了油基燃烧剂分散性测试的影响因素.

sentences.en: The most worrisome trend to law enforcement and private industry alike has been the increase in willingness by these movements to resort to the use of incendiary and explosive devices.
sentences.cn: 对执法部门和企业界来说，最令人不安的趋势已经是这些组织的使用纵火和爆炸器材故意犯罪。

sentences.en: The soldiers were trained to deal with incendiary attacks.
sentences.cn: 士兵们受过对付火攻的训练.

sentences.en: They had it that the fire was incendiary.
sentences.cn: 他们认为这是有人纵火.

sentences.en: This activity has generated politically incendiary profits for banks and bonuses for bankers.
sentences.cn: 这类业务为银行带来了利润,为银行家带来了奖金,这些在政治上都具有煽动性.

words.tran_cn: [军]燃烧弹；纵火犯，放火者；煽动者

trans.tran_cn: 引火的，燃烧的，纵火的，煽动的
trans.tran_en: an incendiary speech, piece of writing etc is intended to make people angry
a bomb designed to cause a fire
